props.direction: Display timeline in a **vertical** or **horizontal** direction
props.mirror: Mirror the before/after ordering of timeline items
props.singleSide: Display all timeline items on one side of the timeline, either **before** or **after**
props.truncateLine: Truncate timeline directly at the **start** or **end** of the line, or on **both** ends
props.linePosition: Shift the position of the line. By default the line will evenly split items before/after.
